attributes.action: Help gay men locked up in concentration camps in Chechnya!
attributes.background: In recent news articles it's been highlighted that gay men are getting locked up and concentration camps in Chechnya. The government has not chosen to help these people as of yet. Gay men are beaten, tortured and forced to put bottles into their private parts! This isn't ok.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's clear that you are concerned about the treatment of gay men in Chechnya, but we're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194767

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194915
